main.bio: My name is Simon, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. Currently I'm searching for work and am doing side projects on the side. I have recently graduated from Queens College with a Bachelor of Science degree majoring in Computer Science. I have experience in Java (6 years), C++ (5 years), and full stack development (2 years). I have finished attending a bootcamp for full stack development where I learned modern technologies such as React, Express, Node, and PostgreSQL with Seuqelize ORM(Object relational mapping).
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details!
